colon.description: Configure the default value for colon for Form.Item (only valid if the property layout is horizontal)
colon.description_zh: 配置 Form.Item 的 colon 的默认值 (只有在属性 layout 为 horizontal 时有效)

disabled.description: Set the form component to be disabled, which is only valid for the antdv component
disabled.description_zh: 设置表单组件禁用，仅对 antdv 组件有效

hideRequiredMark.description: Hides required marks for all form items
hideRequiredMark.description_zh: 隐藏所有表单项的必选标记

labelAlign.description: The text alignment of the label label
labelAlign.description_zh: label 标签的文本对齐方式

:labelCol.description: label layout, with the ''' component, set the 'span' 'offset' value, such as '{span: 3, offset: 12}' <Col>or 'sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}'
:labelCol.description_zh: label 标签布局，同 `<Col>` 组件，设置 `span` `offset` 值，如 `{span: 3, offset: 12}` 或 `sm: {span: 3, offset: 12}`

labelWrap.description: The way the text wraps for label labels
labelWrap.description_zh: label 标签的文本换行方式

name.description: The form name, which is prefixed with the form field 'id'
name.description_zh: 表单名称，会作为表单字段 `id` 前缀使用

noStyle.description: 'true' is not styled and is used as a pure field control
noStyle.description_zh: 为 `true` 时不带样式，作为纯字段控件使用

scrollToFirstError.description: Submission failures automatically scroll to the first error field
scrollToFirstError.description_zh: 提交失败自动滚动到第一个错误字段

validateOnRuleChange.description: Whether to trigger a validation as soon as the rules property is changed
validateOnRuleChange.description_zh: 是否在 rules 属性改变后立即触发一次验证

validateTrigger.description: Configure field validation rules in a unified manner
validateTrigger.description_zh: 统一设置字段校验规则

:wrapperCol.description: Use this property when you need to style a layout for an input control, and use it in the same way as labelCol
:wrapperCol.description_zh: 需要为输入控件设置布局样式时，使用该属性，用法同 labelCol

events.name: finish
events.description: After the form is submitted and the data is validated, the event is called
events.description_zh: 提交表单且数据验证成功后回调事件

events.name: finishFailed
events.description: Callback events are called after the form is submitted and the data validation fails
events.description_zh: 提交表单且数据验证失败后回调事件

events.name: submit
events.description: After the data validation is successful, the event is called
events.description_zh: 数据验证成功后回调事件

events.name: validate
events.description: Triggered when any form item is verified
events.description_zh: 任一表单项被校验后触发
